SEARCH
Package cdx.opencdx.commons.service.impl

Class OpenCDXAuditServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
cdx.opencdx.commons.service.impl.OpenCDXAuditServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OpenCDXAuditService
@Service public class OpenCDXAuditServiceImpl extends Object implements OpenCDXAuditService
This class is an implementation of the OpenCDXAuditService interface. It provides methods for auditing user actions in the OpenCDX system. The class uses an OpenCDXMessageService to send audit events.

The class is annotated with the @Service annotation to indicate that it is a service component. It is also annotated with the @Observed(name = "opencdx") annotation to specify the name of the observer for the audit events.
